name: Outlaw Commander
languages: Common and any one other language

traits.name: Commander's Presence
traits.desc: Whenever one of the commander's allies is within 60 feet must make a saving throw, that creature gains a +1 bonus to the saving throw if the commander isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The commander makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Handaxe
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Expose Weakness (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) slashing damage and the target has its AC reduced by 2 until the beginning of the commander's next turn.
